Sentence_0: Federal Register, Volume 86 Issue 29 (Tuesday, February 16, 2021) [Federal Register Volume 86, Number 29 (Tuesday, February 16, 2021)] [Notices] [Page 9543] From the Federal Register Online via the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov] [FR Doc No: 2021-03002]   -----------------------------------------------------------------------  NATIONAL ARCHIVES AND RECORDS ADMINISTRATION  [NARA-2021-017]   National Industrial Security Program Policy Advisory Committee  (NISPPAC) Meeting  AGENCY: Information Security Oversight Office (ISOO), National Archives  and Records Administration (NARA).
Sentence_1: ACTION: Notice of Federal Advisory Committee meeting.
Sentence_2: -----------------------------------------------------------------------  SUMMARY: We are announcing an upcoming meeting of the National  Industrial Security Program Policy Advisory Committee (NISPPAC).
Sentence_3: DATES: The meeting will be on April 14, 2021, from 10:00 a.m. to 1:00  p.m. EST.
Sentence_4: ADDRESSES: The April 14, 2021, meeting will be a virtual meeting.
Sentence_6: FOR FURTHER INFORMATION CONTACT: Heather Harris Pag[aacute]n, ISOO  Program Analyst, by telephone at 202.357.5351, or by email at  NISPPAC@nara.gov.
Sentence_7: SUPPLEMENTARY INFORMATION: This meeting is open to the public in  accordance with the Federal Advisory Committee Act (5 U.S.C.
Sentence_8: app 2) and  implementing regulations at 41 CFR 101-6.
Sentence_9: The Committee will discuss  National Industrial Security Program policy matters.
Sentence_10: Procedures: You must register in advance through the Event Services  link https://ems8.intellor.com?do=register&t=1&p=836856 if you wish to  attend.
Sentence_11: NISPPAC members, ISOO employees, and speakers should send an  email to NISPPAC@nara.gov for the appropriate registration information  instead of registering with the above link.
Sentence_12: Contact us via email at  NISPPAC@nara.gov with any questions.
Sentence_13: Brian P. McLaughlin, Acting Committee Management Officer.
